mapper.delete:
delete from t_goods_order_logistics where id in
#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_goods_order_logistics
real_name = #{realName},
phone = #{phone},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
address = #{address},
is_deliver = #{isDeliver},
logistics_company = #{logisticsCompany},
logistics_code = #{logisticsCode},
logistics_no = #{logisticsNo},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_active = #{isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id} and version + 1 <= #{version}

update.foreach:
update t_goods_order_logistics
real_name = #{item.realName},
phone = #{item.phone},
province = #{item.province},
city = #{item.city},
district = #{item.district},
address = #{item.address},
is_deliver = #{item.isDeliver},
logistics_company = #{item.logisticsCompany},
logistics_code = #{item.logisticsCode},
logistics_no = #{item.logisticsNo},
version = #{item.version},
create_time = #{item.createTime},
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
is_active = #{item.isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
version = version + 1,
where id = #{item.id}

mapper.sql: id as id, real_name as realName, phone as phone, province as province, city as city, district as district, address as address, is_deliver as isDeliver, logistics_company as logisticsCompany, logistics_code as logisticsCode, logistics_no as logisticsNo, version as version, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_active as isActive
